footer.signUpAgreement: By signing up, you agree to our {privacyPolicy} and {termsOfService}.
footer.getLatestNews: Get the latest news from us

common.encounteredError: We encountered an unexpected error. Please try again
common.noDataFoundMessage: We couldn't find any data matching your request.
common.notAllowedDescription: You do not have permission to delete this item or it may no longer exist.

register.registrationSuccessfulDescription: We have sent a verification email to your registered email address. Please check your inbox (and spam folder) and click the link to verify your account. If you don’t receive it within a few minutes, you can request a new one.
register.registrationRequestLimitDescription: You’ve requested too many verification emails. Please wait before trying again.
register.verificationSuccessDescription: Your email has been successfully verified. You can now log in and start exploring. Welcome aboard!
register.invalidTokenDescription: The verification token is either invalid or has expired. Please request a new verification email and try again.
register.disposableEmailNotAllowedDescription: We do not allow disposable email addresses. Please use a real email for account security.

providerLoginFailed.title: Provider Authentication Failed
providerLoginFailed.description: An error occurred while authenticating with the provider. The credentials may be invalid, or the authentication request failed. Please try again.

invalidProvider.title: Invalid Authentication Provider
invalidProvider.description: The selected authentication provider is not supported. Please choose a different provider to proceed.

loginError.title: Invalid credentials
loginError.description: Please check your credentials and try again.

authFormValidationError.firstNameMin: First name should have at least 2 letters
authFormValidationError.lastNameMin: Last name should have at least 2 letters
authFormValidationError.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters long
authFormValidationError.passwordUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
authFormValidationError.passwordLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
authFormValidationError.passwordNumber: Password must contain at least one number
authFormValidationError.passwordSpecial: Password must contain at least one special character
authFormValidationError.confirmPasswordRequired: Both password and confirm password are required
authFormValidationError.termsRequired: You must accept the terms to proceed.

errors.cardNumberInvalid: Card number must be 13 to 19 digits
errors.expiryYearInvalidFormat: Expiry year must be a 4-digit number
errors.expiryYearInPast: Expiry year must not be in the past

errors.productIdInvalid: Product ID must be a valid UUID
errors.sizeIdInvalid: Size ID must be a valid UUID
errors.colorIdInvalid: Color ID must be a valid UUID
errors.quantityInvalidNumber: Quantity must be a valid number
errors.featureImage1IdInvalid: Feature image 1 ID must be a valid UUID
errors.featureImage2IdInvalid: Feature image 2 ID must be a valid UUID
errors.cartIdInvalid: Cart ID must be a valid UUID

cart.notificationMessage: Your item has been successfully added to the cart. Happy shopping!
cart.emptyCartMessage: Start browsing our products and add some to your cart!
cart.thankYouMessage: Your order has been received and is being processed. A confirmation email has been sent to you.

productNotFound.title: Product Not Found
productNotFound.description: The requested product could not be found.

internalServerError.title: Internal Server Error
internalServerError.description: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

resetPassword.enterEmailForReset: Enter your email to get a reset link
resetPassword.resetPasswordLimitDescription: You’ve requested too many password reset emails. Please wait before trying again.
resetPassword.resetPasswordEmailSentDescription: We've sent you an email with a link to reset your password. Please check your inbox and click the button in the email to proceed.
resetPassword.resetPasswordSuccessDescription: Your password has been successfully updated. You can now log in with your new password.

orders.title: Your Orders
orders.noOrdersSubtitle: Browse our collection and start shopping today.
